topics.body: Finally some good news: my grandma is visiting my mom and my grandma is doing way better psychologically.  Basically a couple years ago my grandma become a severe pill addict and wound up getting put in a -asylum- "home"; it's been years since she got arrested and now she can function.  She may or may not move in with my mom, don't know honestly, but it would probably be for the best.  Why?  Short version is my grandma is loaded with cash; my mom is dirt poor and getting old; my mom lives in a small house that only costs a couple hundred a month; if grandma lives with my mom then my mom can stop working and care for her mom and retire.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
